summary: The article discusses how malware developers are increasingly leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance the sophistication and stealthiness of their malicious software. summary: In a concerning development for the software development community, the "Shai-Hulud" worm has been identified as a major threat to the npm ecosystem through a sophisticated supply chain attack.
